While Americans suffer from the left's dedication to making sure no human is illegal, they couldn't even be bothered to pretend to care.

Rep. Jerry Nadler, who believes we would have a rotting produce epidemic if not for illegal immigration, slept during the testimony of migrant crime victims.

From frustrated f
title: Despicable! Watch Dem Jerry Nadler doze off during hearing on Harris-Biden border crisis victims

description:
While the media and those on the left slander anyone who wishes to Make America Great Again (MAGA) as nazis, that couldn’t be further from the truth.

Although common sense would tell most that dedicating your campaign to America the Country Great is an objectively good thing, the left tries to convince otherwise. So if you know someone who might be wondering who the MAGA people are, show them this nature parody.

While the left despises American prosperity, they are actively promoting every policy that would undoubtedly destroy the nation.

Who really are the MAGA People? pic.twitter.com/Zk6rvijCge
— Nicole Shanahan (@NicoleShanahan)
title: Watch: RFK Jr's running mate drops BRILLIANT "nature doc" examining who "The MAGA People" are
